shirts.pageDescription: New TILECT t-shirts designed in collaboration with illustrator Célestin Krier.
shirts.pageDescription2: With your contribution, you help defend Barcelona's electronic culture by supporting our non-profit association so we can keep organizing events.
shirts.productDetails: 100% organic cotton t-shirts, 180 GSM, both with a medium fit pattern suitable for all body types. Screen printing in lilac on the back.
shirts.careInstructions: Care instructions: Wash similar colors together, do not iron the printed area, wash and iron inside out. Do not tumble dry.
shirts.certifications: Certified product: Peta Approved Vegan | Certified by Control Union CU819434 | OEKO-TEX standard 100
